text: Ahn Il-joo (born 2 May 1988) is a Korean professional footballer who plays for Daejeon Citizen in K League 2 as a defender. == External links == * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Pohang Steelers players Category:Sangju Sangmu FC players Category:Bucheon FC 1995 players Category:Daejeon Hana Citizen FC players Category:K League 1 players Category:K League 2 players Category:Korea National League players Category:South Korean footballers
title: Ahn Il-joo
